content.body: meta nit: Do we want to keep the name of this room at _whatwg_ (lowercase)? or should we change it to _WHATWG_ (uppercase)?
content.formatted_body: meta nit: Do we want to keep the name of this room at whatwg (lowercase)? or should we change it to WHATWG (uppercase)?

content.body: I don’t have a strong opinion about it either way, but if we’re gonna change it, it seems slightly better to change it now rather than later (for one thing, it affects how to we refer to it in https://whatwg.org/chat)

content.body: I vote for WHATWG
The address is still lowercase though. It seems you can also get uppercase addresses, but that seems a bit weird?

On Twitter we actually have the URL part in uppercase, but I'm not a big fan of uppercase letters in URLs personally
So while creating the new blog account I also found out we had 24 comments on our latest post that had to be approved. Got excited for a moment, but they were all spam.
I'm running into Wordpress bugs about escaping character references 😩
